column3:
Closing because I don't want pull requests to turn into Yet Another Place to discuss ideas.

Reworking how fees work is a good idea, but should be discussed on bitcoin-dev of the forums before submitting half an implementation.

This particular change _was_ discussed (at least on IRC) a while back when fForRelay was being added. IIRC, we had an agreement it would be a good change, but not of immediate urgency (the immediate concern was reducing txn fees).\n
